response.overview: A fun and light hearted short film about the effects of internet and people in a cafe's reliance on WiFi. What happens when it gets shut off for unknown reasons and the patrons all go nuts? They have to rely on their interpersonal skills and not Ai to make things happen for themselves. Watch a great film! See it on Montageplay.com
response.tagline: A fun and light hearted short film about the effects of internet and people in a cafe's reliance on WiFi.
response.title: Cafe Glass
